item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 17, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Humans have caused 1.5 °C of long-term global warming according to new estimates (308 points | 296 comments)

7. Creating a QR Code step by step (16 points | 3 comments)
8. Bpftune uses BPF to auto-tune Linux systems (175 points | 42 comments)

13. Garak, LLM Vulnerability Scanner (104 points | 29 comments)

25. Transistor for fuzzy logic hardware: promise for better edge computing (14 points | 3 comments)
26. How to setup self hosted wiki for your startup (81 points | 32 comments)
27. Two Nobel Prize winners want to cancel their own CRISPR patents in Europe (122 points | 96 comments)
28. Lucid dreaming app triples users' awareness in dreams, study finds (40 points | 22 comments)
29. The myth that you can’t build interactive web apps except as single page app (145 points | 78 comments)
30. Claude AI built me a React app to compare maps side by side (149 points | 166 comments)
